Title: 🖼 🇱🇧🇮🇱⚡️- Red alerts in northern Israel (Kiryat Shmona / Ift...
Description: 🇱🇧🇮🇱⚡️- Red alerts in northern Israel (Kiryat Shmona / Iftach direction.)A massive barrage of drones and rockets were detected above the settlements surrounding Kiryat Shmona.Sirens have been ringing in this sector for more than 10 minutes, and many settlements bordering the occupied Golan Heights are under alarm due to this salvo of projectiles.Hezbollah has been massively stepping up operations in northern Israel over the last few days, and today appears to be no different.
